hero.title: About Win Win
hero.subtitle: We are a team that lives sales. Win Win d.o.o. was built on the belief that sales can be done differently — honestly, ethically, and with a long-term mindset.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To become the most effective and respected sales company in Slovenia, known for our integrity, results, and commitment to both clients and team members.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To deliver more value to customers than they expect, through trust, structure, and top-level sales expertise. We build long-term relationships that benefit everyone involved.

values.title: Integrity & Honesty
values.description: We build trust through transparent communication and ethical business practices

values.title: Reliability
values.description: Our clients and team members can count on us to deliver on our commitments

values.title: Professional Communication
values.description: Clear, respectful, and effective communication in every interaction

values.title: Performance & Growth
values.description: Continuous improvement and measurable results drive our success

values.title: Team Support
values.description: We succeed together through collaboration and mutual support

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We strive for the highest standards in everything we do

culture.title: Company Culture
culture.description: We've built an environment where talented professionals can thrive

faq.question: What makes Win Win different from other sales agencies?
faq.answer: We combine clear structure, honest communication, strong coaching culture, long-term career opportunities, and a results-driven but supportive environment. At Win Win, success is not luck — it is a system.

faq.question: Do you provide training for newcomers to sales?
faq.answer: Yes! We provide comprehensive onboarding including product knowledge, sales scripts, CRM training, and ongoing coaching. Many of our top performers started with no prior sales experience.

faq.question: What kind of support do you offer?
faq.answer: We provide CRM tools, proven scripts, back-office support, regular coaching sessions, performance tracking, and a supportive team environment. You're never alone in your sales journey.

faq.question: How is compensation structured?
faq.answer: Our compensation models vary by role but always include performance-based earnings. We offer competitive base salaries or hourly rates plus attractive commission structures with uncapped earning potential.

faq.question: What career progression opportunities exist?
faq.answer: Top performers can advance to senior sales roles, team leadership positions, or specialized B2B consultancy. We promote from within and reward consistent excellence.

faq.question: Do you work with both B2C and B2B clients?
faq.answer: Yes, we operate across multiple channels: field sales (B2C), call center operations (B2C), and business consulting (B2B). This diversity offers varied career paths for different skill sets and preferences.

seo.summaryTitle: About the Win Win Sales Team – One of Slovenia's Leading Sales Companies
seo.html:
Win Win D.o.o. – A Slovenian Sales Company Success Story

Win Win D.o.o. is one of Slovenia's leading sales companies, specialized in direct sales of telecommunications services through field sales, promotions in shopping centers, and call center operations. We were established with the vision to become the best sales company in Slovenia, offering employment, career development, and financial independence to all who are willing to invest effort and energy in achieving results. Our sales team operates throughout Slovenia and partners with the leading Slovenian telecommunications provider Telemach Slovenia.

Our Mission and Values

The mission of Win Win D.o.o. is to create an environment where every individual can develop their sales potential, achieve their financial goals, and build a long-term career in sales. Our values are based on honesty, transparency, teamwork, perseverance, and continuous improvement. We believe that success is the result of hard work, disciplined execution, and the right mindset.

Our Sales Team – Field Experts

At Win Win D.o.o., we seek experienced sales professionals, team leaders, managers, and sales directors who have extensive experience in direct sales, B2C sales, and B2B sales. Our employees regularly participate in sales training and workshops where they upgrade their knowledge and skills.

Win Win sales consultants are trained to work in the field, in shopping centers, at promotions, and in the call center. We use modern IT tools, sales platforms, analytical tools, and communication systems that enable efficient work and real-time results tracking.

Sales Programs and Training

Win Win D.o.o. conducts regular sales programs and training for all employees, regardless of their experience. Our training program includes: sales techniques, communication skills, negotiation strategies, objection handling, closing sales, CRM system usage, telephone sales, field sales, leading sales teams, and management skills.

New employees go through a proven onboarding program that includes theoretical training, practical exercises, shadowing experienced salespeople, and independent work under mentor supervision. After successfully completing training, they receive a certificate and become full members of the sales team.

Our Services – Comprehensive Sales Solutions

Win Win D.o.o. offers a spectrum of sales services that include: direct sales of telecommunications services in the field, at promotions in shopping centers, call sales - telemarketing, business sales (B2B), customer consulting, customer relationship management (CRM), and long-term partnership relationships.

Partnerships and Collaborations

Win Win D.o.o. partners with the leading Slovenian telecommunications provider Telemach Slovenia, which enables us to market their services in the Slovenian market. In addition to our main partner, we also collaborate with marketing companies Optispin and TellyNet, which provide us with contacts who need our services. Long-term partnerships are based on trust, transparency, achieving agreed goals, and mutual respect.

Thanks to strong partners, we can provide employees with stability, regular payments, and growth opportunities. Our salespeople have access to exclusive offers, promotional campaigns, and bonus programs offered by our partners.

Technology and Tools for Successful Sales

Win Win D.o.o. uses modern technology to support sales processes. Employees have access to CRM applications that enable customer management, tracking sales activities, recording visits, monitoring results, and accessing sales materials. We also use advanced analytical systems for tracking KPIs, sales forecasting, customer segmentation, and optimizing sales strategies.

Our offices are spacious and provide a dignified workplace for every individual. Employees have access to personal laptops, tablets, headsets, and all physical internal materials for guaranteed success.

Company Culture – An Environment That Encourages Success

At Win Win D.o.o., we build a culture of success where effort, results, innovation, and team spirit are valued. We organize regular team buildings, motivational events, awards for top salespeople, annual meetings, and success celebrations. Our leadership is accessible, supports employees, and actively participates in developing individual career paths.

We believe in transparent communication, open feedback, and a fair advancement system. Every employee has the opportunity to advance based on their results, competencies, and commitment to the company. Top salespeople become team leaders, managers, trainers, or company partners.

Career Opportunities and Advancement

A career at Win Win D.o.o. starts as a sales consultant in the field or call center. With proven results, you advance to higher positions: senior sales consultant, sales team leader, sales manager, regional manager, sales director, or company partner. Each position brings higher earnings, greater responsibility, leading larger teams, and access to bonus programs.

The company actively invests in staff development and offers opportunities for additional training, certificates, conferences, and coaching. Employees who demonstrate leadership abilities are included in a mentoring program where they learn from experienced managers and directors.

Our Locations Throughout Slovenia

Win Win D.o.o. has offices in Trzin and Kranj. Our sales teams also operate in smaller towns and municipalities, where we organize promotional events, field sales, and call sales.

Each office is equipped with workspaces, meeting rooms, break rooms, and all necessary tools for efficient work. Employees have the option to work at multiple locations, rotate between teams, and occasionally work from home for certain positions.

Social Responsibility and Ethics

Win Win D.o.o. operates in accordance with the highest ethical standards and compliance with legislation. Our sales practice is transparent, honest, and focused on customer satisfaction. We are committed to fair treatment of employees, partners, and customers.

How to Become Part of Win Win D.o.o.?

If you want to become part of our successful sales team, visit our website, review open positions, and apply for the position that interests you. We accept applications from candidates with various profiles: beginners without experience, students, experienced salespeople, management personnel, and telecommunications sales specialists.

Our recruitment process is fast, transparent, and professional. After reviewing applications, we invite you for an interview where you meet our team, company culture, and development opportunities. Successful candidates go through training and begin their sales career with our support and mentorship.

Join the Winning Team

Win Win D.o.o. is more than a company – it's a community of ambitious individuals who share common values and goals. If you want to build a successful career in sales, achieve financial independence, develop your skills, and become part of Slovenia's best sales team, we are the right choice for you. Join us and discover what it means to win together!
